column4: hello im trying to install ndiswrapper on my unbutu...i have the latest one in a tar.gz on the computer....but i cant use make?
dont do tar.gz
btw that computer doesnt have a internet connection atm
use apt / synaptic
well is it on the dvd?
hmm... i dont remember
cuz that computer only uses wireless
how could i use the tar.gz untill i get it online?
you cant plug it in manually for a bit ?
well, most likely you will not have the compiler tools you need to make the source.
if you just did fresh install
yea
well
ill get the cable...its a pian but ill do it :D
yeah, then just type 'sudo apt get install ndiswrapper'
apt get = apt-get
thanks
hmm sudo ifconfig eth0 didnt bring it up?
any ideas
do you know how to use ndiswrapper ?
sudo ifup eth0
